transport-options.legend: How will you arrive in the UK?

by-land.label: By road from the Republic of Ireland

flight-number.label:
New flight number

For example EK009, QR003 or KU101

If you have any stops or connecting flights you must enter the number for the final part of your journey to the UK

accept-declaration.label: I understand and agree with the above

uk-duration.legend: How long are you staying in the UK for?

uk-departure-travel-number.label: Enter the flight number, train number or boat name for your departure from the UK
uk-departure-travel-number.hint: The details will be on your travel documents

uk-date-of-departure.legend: What date will you be leaving the UK?

uk-port-of-departure.label: What airport, train station or port are you leaving the UK from?
uk-port-of-departure.hint: The details will be on your travel documents

train-number.label: What is your train number?
train-number.hint: For example, Eurostar 9140. Enter 'Irish Rail' if you are travelling from the Republic of Ireland

train-departure-date.legend: What date does your train to the UK depart?

train-departure-time.legend: What time does your train to the UK depart?
train-departure-time.hint: Use the 24 hour clock, for example 09:45 or 21:45

train-departure-country.label: What country is your train to the UK travelling from?

train-departure-station.label: What station is your train to the UK from?

train-arrival-station.label: What is your arrival train station in the UK?

train-arrival-date.legend: Date of arrival in the UK

train-arrival-time.legend: What time is your train due to arrive in the UK?
train-arrival-time.hint: Use the 24 hour clock, for example 09:45 or 21:45
